title: (x) Dry brush script caps / Help identifying this hand-drawn font - Edo {Mike Y}
content:
Hi.  
I'm having troubles identifying this font. Could you help me please?  
 [http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/8229/capturadepantalla200912r.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104115/http:/img10.imageshack.us/img10/8229/capturadepantalla200912r.png "http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/8229/capturadepantalla200912r.png")

Thanks in advance!
author: aldeasim

comments.content:
It's [Edo](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104115/http:/www.dafont.com/edo.font?nb_ppp=50&text=MERECE) a free font by Vic Fieger.

- Mike Yanega
